data_description.endpoint: The endpoint of the Actual Budget server (e.g., http://localhost:5006 or https://actual.example.com)
data_description.password: The server password (set when starting Actual Budget server, NOT an API key)
data_description.encrypt_password: Optional: The password to decrypt the budget file (if file encryption is enabled)
data_description.file: The budget file ID (UUID format, found in Actual Budget web interface)
data_description.cert: SSL certificate path, or write 'SKIP' to skip certificate validation for self-signed certificates
data_description.currency: The currency symbol to use for sensors (e.g., $, €, £)
